find_icon.name: Find and Download Icon
find_icon.description: Search and download icons/logos from LobeHub's icon library (unpkg.com/@lobehub/icons-static-png). Supports light and dark mode variants. Downloads the icon to the presentation/images/ directory and returns the local file path. Available icons include: claude, langgraph, langchain, nvidia, openai, anthropic, huggingface, google, amazon, microsoft, github, python, javascript, typescript, react, and many more tech/AI brand icons.

icon_name.description: Name of the icon to find (e.g., 'claude', 'openai', 'langchain', 'nvidia', 'langgraph', 'anthropic', 'huggingface'). Case-insensitive.

mode.description: Color mode variant - 'light' for light backgrounds or 'dark' for dark backgrounds. Defaults to 'dark'.

size.description: Icon size to download - '16', '32', '64', '128', or '256'. Defaults to '128'.

hello_world.name: Hello World
hello_world.description: A simple test tool that returns 'Hello, World!' - useful for testing tool functionality.

extract_slide_images.name: Extract Slide Images
extract_slide_images.description: Convert PDF pages to individual PNG images for per-slide analysis. Each page becomes slide_1.png, slide_2.png, etc. Uses pdf2image library (requires poppler). Returns list of paths to extracted slide images.

pdf_path.description: Path to the PDF file to extract slides from

output_dir.description: Directory to save extracted slide images
